name: harvest-integration
description: CLI tool to migrate time entries between Harvest instances

scripts.start: NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' src/index.ts
scripts.migrate: NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' src/index.ts migrate
